# ShieldConfiguration

**Structure**

An object that defines the appearance of a shield to display over an application or website.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ShieldConfiguration
```

## Overview

The system provides a default appearance for any properties you set to `nil`.

## Defining the Appearance

- **backgroundBlurStyle**: A blur style to apply to the background of the shield.
- **backgroundColor**: A color for a shield to use in the background blur effect.
- **icon**: An icon to display in the center of the shield.
- **primaryButtonBackgroundColor**: The color to fill the contents of the rounded rectangle primary button.
- **primaryButtonLabel**: The label of the topmost rounded rectangle button.
- **secondaryButtonLabel**: The label of the optional secondary button.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for a shield to display below the title.
- **title**: The title of the shield to display below the icon.
- **ShieldConfiguration.Label**: The appearance of text labels within a shield.

## Creating the Shield Configuration

- **init(backgroundBlurStyle:backgroundColor:icon:title:subtitle:primaryButtonLabel:primaryButtonBackgroundColor:secondaryButtonLabel:)**: Creates a shield configuration with the specified values.

## Shield Configuration

- **ShieldConfigurationDataSource**: The base class for the principal object of an app extension that configures a shield’s appearance.
